resources.string: You must select a user certificate
Disconnect connected VPN / cancel connection attempt?

On some custom ICS system versions, the permissions for /dev/tun may be incorrect or there may be no such file at all. CM9 system users please try to fix the permissions through the repair option in the program settings.
failed to open the tun interface
The interface information %1$s and %2$s have been obtained, and the second address is used as the remote address. Use /32 as the local mask. The mode given by the VPN is \"%3$s\".
Unable to use %1$s and %2$s as routes in the form of CIDR, the subnet mask of /32 will be used.

Cannot access the Android keychain certificate. This may be due to a firmware upgrade or by restoring the backed up application/software settings. Edit the VPN profile and re-select the certificate in the basic settings to recreate the certificate access.
no IP information, refuse to open tun device
No CA certificate was found in the Android keystore. Possible verification failed.
An error occurred while signing with the Android keystore %1$s: %2$s

The DNS server is not used and the domain name cannot be resolved. Consider setting up a DNS server. Note that even if you dont have a DNS server set up, the proxy settings you set for mobile networks and Wi-Fi are also valid.
Unable to add DNS server \"%1$s\", %2$s rejected your operation.
Unable to configure IP address %1$s, rejected by the system: %2$s
The VPN crashed unexpectedly. It is recommended that you use the Send Dump File feature in the main menu to send a dump file to the developer

There is a problem with some versions of Android 4.1 if the name of the keystore certificate contains non-alphanumeric characters (such as spaces, underscores, or dashes). Please try to re-import the certificate without special characters
Pause the connection when the screen is closed: less than %1$s
Warning: The VPN does not enable "persistent tun device". When the screen is closed, network traffic will not go through the VPN tunnel, but will go to Wi-Fi or mobile network.
suspend VPN according to user requirements
The VPN topology "%3$s" is specified, but using ifconfig %1$s %2$s looks more like a netmask IP address. Assume the topology of the "subnet".
Remove it from the application allow block list, no longer install package %s
You need to define and enable at least one remote server.
Restart the VPN service (application crash - may be a real crash or killed due to insufficient memory)
No allowed apps were added. Join this app (%s) to ensure that at least one app is allowed in the list of allowed apps to block all other apps
Preferred native ABI precedence of this device (%1$s) and ABI reported by native libraries (%2$s) mismatch
VPN permissions are revoked by the operating system (such as other VPN programs started), VPN stops
missing user certificate or user certificate key file
Reread (%d) log items from the log cache file
The connection has been waiting for %s seconds
this Application is Notification Base ! it means That u can Just control Vpn Actions [Disconnect-Pause-Connect] from notification Bar .
couldn\'t connect to This Server Just Now !
